title: Cognitive Load Theory-Based Optimized Flipped Learning Design for Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical terminology and human anatomy understanding
context.additional_context: The need for flipped learning design to efficiently acquire complex medical concepts in time-constrained settings.

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 90% cognitive load efficiency scores using pre-learning materials (PREP)
Learners achieve over 85% accuracy in analyzing severe patient cases through VR simulations
Learners reduce average preparation time by 20% through at least three iterative revisions of materials
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
